description.value:
This wooden staff is remarkably sturdy and unyielding. While wielding the staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your DC to avoid being shoved or tripped.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shield]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Alarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mystic Armor]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Alarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Safe Passage]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mystic Armor], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Safe Passage]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mystic Armor], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Repulsion]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
